item.title: Positioning, Categories, Labels
item.description: Lawyer, Doctor, Accountant, Carpenter, plumber, electrician, mason. We know what these labels mean. We know what these professions do, or are supposed to do. Aren’t socially accepted labels enough to identify professions and businesses? Not really, we do categories professions. A doctor is not just a doctor. A doctor is a general practitioner, cardiologist, neurosurgeon, psychiatrist, etc.. We do categorise. For convenience and ease of identifying the expert who can solve our problem.
